title: Virus Surveillance in Pediatric Solid Organ Transplant Recipients: Identifying Risk Factors for PTLD and Other Complications Post-Transplant

operands.value: All solid organ transplant recipients receiving their care at Seattle Children's Hospital
Must have maximum age of 21 Years

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Age from birth to 21 years'), Symbol("All solid organ transplant recipients receiving their care at Seattle Children's Hospital"), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 21 Years'), Symbol('Signed consent'), Symbol('when age appropriate, signed assent'), Not(Symbol('Lack of consent')))
